name: Rules Check
description: Welcome to GunnHacks 7.0 CTF! For instructions on how to participate in the CTF and important information about prizes, check out the #ctf-instructions channel on the Discord server. (The flag for this challenge will be there too.) If you have any questions about the CTF, please send a DM to chop0#2274 and/or qpwoeirut#5057.
author: Stanley Zhong
